meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one billion hertz.
meanings.sent1: My computer's processor speed is measured in gigahertz.
meanings.sent2: The new smartphone boasts a processor running at two gigahertz.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke that the snail's pace was measured in gigahertz!
meanings.sent4: The music was so fast, it felt like it was playing at a million gigahertz.
meanings.sent5: The gigahertz measurement determines how quickly the computer can process information.

meanings.definition: A measurement of the frequency of electromagnetic radiation.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use gigahertz to measure the frequency of radio waves.
meanings.sent2: The satellite communication system operates at several gigahertz.
meanings.sent3: The aliens communicated using gigahertz frequencies in the movie.
meanings.sent4: The gigahertz waves traveled through space like invisible threads.
meanings.sent5: The gigahertz reading indicated the strength of the electromagnetic radiation.
